item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: I’m new to blacksmithing. What equipment do I need to get started? # You’ll need something to get your steel hot (a forge), something to hit your steel with (a hammer), and something to hit your steel against (an anvil). Check out our beginner recommendations page for some specifics. Is a piece of railroad track / I-beam a good beginner anvil? # We don’t recommend using either railroad track or I-beam as anvil substitutes.
